title: >>> The SUPERBOWL of Dodgeball
body_text:
DODGEBALL LX Captains Warfare
... Mike "Rozz" vs. Kyle Carty ... Lauren Winston vs. Lauren Freda ... Joe Kelly vs. Derek Carty ... Kevin Adams vs. Ryan Letsche ...
Those are just four of the most exciting and intense captains wars of days past. For DODGEBALL LX, it is only fitting that a captains showdown of the same magnitude be arranged.
But how can a single battle even at DODGEBALL LX compare to those timeless classics above? Simple. Take four of the finest athletes in history, pair them off, and you have yourself an amazing 2 on 2 match-up filled with nothing but pure adrenaline!
Seriously, what if Matt Brown, Tom Adams, Mike Edwards, and Kevin Megill were in the same match? Or Zach Katz, Kevin Fitzpatrick, John Watters, and Dan Spengeman? Hell, even the women can get a piece of the action; Melissa Kerr, Alison Bertsch, the list goes on and on.
So you're probably asking yourself "How": How can a match of such significance take place? This is how ...
How to Enter!
I.
Align yourself with another player, thus forming a two-person team.
II.
Enter yourselves into the pre-game contest, whatever that may be (Rimshot, "HTH", etc.).
III.
Win the contest along with your partner and have yourself a match at the Season 6 finale!
**The rules mirror those included in the DODGEBALL 50 Rimshot Contest, only this time two teams emerge victorious.**
DODGEBALL LX Awards
Tradition has been a prime reason for the success all players currently enjoy. Since the first season-ender, one tradition has never died. The coveted "Dodgeball Excellence" awards will return at the 60th dodgeball extravanganza. And there's only one place where you can get a sneak peak, and that's right here on
dodgeball.livejournal.com
.
Without further ado, here are a few categories you will likely see presented this Saturday:
> The return of the "Prodigy Award", first awarded to Lenny Herrera and Matt Brown at DODGEBALL 20
> The "Act of Courage" Award, given to those who have participated despite a serious physical injury
DODGEBALL LX is shaping up to be a colossal night! Do not miss out on this once in a lifetime event!
body_html:
DODGEBALL LX Captains Warfare

... Mike "Rozz" vs. Kyle Carty ... Lauren Winston vs. Lauren Freda ... Joe Kelly vs. Derek Carty ... Kevin Adams vs. Ryan Letsche ...

Those are just four of the most exciting and intense captains wars of days past. For DODGEBALL LX, it is only fitting that a captains showdown of the same magnitude be arranged.

But how can a single battle even at DODGEBALL LX compare to those timeless classics above? Simple. Take four of the finest athletes in history, pair them off, and you have yourself an amazing 2 on 2 match-up filled with nothing but pure adrenaline!

Seriously, what if Matt Brown, Tom Adams, Mike Edwards, and Kevin Megill were in the same match? Or Zach Katz, Kevin Fitzpatrick, John Watters, and Dan Spengeman? Hell, even the women can get a piece of the action; Melissa Kerr, Alison Bertsch, the list goes on and on.

So you're probably asking yourself "How": How can a match of such significance take place? This is how ...

How to Enter!
I. Align yourself with another player, thus forming a two-person team.
II. Enter yourselves into the pre-game contest, whatever that may be (Rimshot, "HTH", etc.).
III. Win the contest along with your partner and have yourself a match at the Season 6 finale!

**The rules mirror those included in the DODGEBALL 50 Rimshot Contest, only this time two teams emerge victorious.**




DODGEBALL LX Awards

Tradition has been a prime reason for the success all players currently enjoy. Since the first season-ender, one tradition has never died. The coveted "Dodgeball Excellence" awards will return at the 60th dodgeball extravanganza. And there's only one place where you can get a sneak peak, and that's right here on dodgeball.livejournal.com.

Without further ado, here are a few categories you will likely see presented this Saturday:
> The return of the "Prodigy Award", first awarded to Lenny Herrera and Matt Brown at DODGEBALL 20
> The "Act of Courage" Award, given to those who have participated despite a serious physical injury




DODGEBALL LX is shaping up to be a colossal night! Do not miss out on this once in a lifetime event!
